titleStmt.title: A vvedding sermon preached at Bentley in Darby-shire vpon Michaelmasse day last past anno Domini. 1607. Wherein is set forth the bond and preseruation. ... By R. Abbot ...
titleStmt.author: Abbot, Robert, 1560-1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: By N. O[kes] for Roger Iackson dwelling in Fleetstreet neere to the great conduit,

notesStmt.note: At the wedding of Sir John Stanhope and Olive Berrisford.
The three final leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
